sentences.english: Studying the chemical method in transforming lutein esters to lutein.
sentences.chinese: 建了化學法轉化葉黃素酯爲遊離態葉黃素的工藝。

sentences.english: Studying the chemical method in transforming lutein esters to lutein.
sentences.chinese: 建了化學法轉化葉黃素酯爲遊離態葉黃素的工藝。

sentences.english: Effect of lutein on the differentiation of osteoclast induced from bone marrow were studied in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 研究葉黃素對體外破骨細胞分化的影響。

sentences.english: The technical factors of the xanthophylls extraction from marigold flower were researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了循環超聲技術在萬壽菊中葉黃素提取中的應用。

sentences.english: Optimization on Ultrasound-assisted Extraction Technology of Xanthophylls from Corn Gluten Meal;
sentences.chinese: 研究了循環超聲技術在萬壽菊中葉黃素提取中的應用。

sentences.english: The purpose was to carry out the test of extracting the lutein from Cassia surattensis Burm flowers.
sentences.chinese: 爲了進行黃槐花中葉黃素的提取試驗。

sentences.english: Fasting blood samples were taken to assess plasma concentrations of lutein and zeaxanthin .
sentences.chinese: 採集禁食血樣以評定血漿中葉黃素和玉米黃質的濃度。

sentences.english: Study on Ultrasonic-assisted Solvent Extraction of Lutein from Tagetes eracta Linn.
sentences.chinese: 超聲波強化有機溶劑提取萬壽菊中葉黃素的研究。

sentences.english: The correlation of the lutein content and the nitrogen content was significantly positive.
sentences.chinese: 葉黃素含量與菸葉總氮含量呈顯著正相關。

sentences.english: By the strong anti-oxidation characteristics of lutein to improve the eyesight of glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 通過葉黃素的強抗氧化特性來改善青光眼的視力。

sentences.english: Microwave-assisted extraction of lutein esters from marigold was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 萬壽菊爲一年生草本植物，含有豐富的葉黃素酯。

sentences.english: It is naturally derived from marigold flowers and contains a normal blend of carotenoids including zeaxanthin and cryptoxanthin.
sentences.chinese: 葉黃素是一種混合類胡卜素，包括玉米黃質和隱黃質。
